name: Searched
description:
EPILEPSI WARNING WHEN PLAYING!

Welcome to Dunkelwald! The infamous forest of Dunkelwald is home to a vile Creature of the Night known to the locals as the Högl. The creature that inhabits this forest is not the only sinister thing about this place, during the second world war, it was used to store gruesome weapons, and was used to test experimental weapons of mass destruction. The houses and huts of this forest have therefore been home to many victims of the great war, and this is where you come in. After many years have passed you have returned to the horrid Dunkelwald, to retrieve 5 dogtags of your fallen breathen. As you seach for the last remnants of your long lost companions, you find yourself not as alone as you might have thought...

Note: 
1. Hiding capabilities is available in all houses
2. Please play in the dark, as the game is best viewed that way.

Controls:
Pick up/Interact 'E'
Hide 'E'
turn on/off flashligt 'left click'
show or hide checklist 'right click'

Swing by our discord if you have questions or improvements: https://discord.gg/ARkqARXtmU

Current Roadmap:
Animated monster. (Works for now)
Ending cutscene. (Not much do after you win right now)
Overall optimization.

OBS: Please keep in mind this is a prototype, and a school project. It is unknown if we move on with another project. I'll keep this site updated if we decide to discontinue the project.
